title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-7.3 - Notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-7.3 - Notification

State Regulations
(a) 'Notification
of recordation'. Within five business days of recordation of a
CO
2
allowance transfer under section
242-7.2
of this Subpart, the
department or its agent will notify each party to the transfer. Notice will be
given to the CO
2
authorized account representatives of
both the transferor and transferee accounts. (b) 'Notification of non-recordation'. Within
10 business days of receipt of a CO
2
allowance transfer
that fails to meet the requirements of subdivision
242-7.2
(a) of this

Subpart, the department or its agent will notify the CO
2
authorized account representatives of both accounts subject to the transfer of: (1)
a decision not to record the transfer, and
(2)
the reasons for such
non-recordation. (c) Nothing in this section shall preclude the submission of a
CO
2
allowance transfer for recordation following
notification of non-recordation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-7.3

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
